Package com.codewithej.realestateapi.controller

Class AgentController

java.lang.Object
com.codewithej.realestateapi.controller.AgentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/agents") public class AgentController extends Object
Rest controller for managing agents.

Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on agents, managing their properties and clients.

      Parameters:
      agentDTO - The agent DTO for creation.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the created agent DTO and HTTP status code.

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the agent to update.
      agentDTO - The updated agent DTO.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated agent DTO.

      Deletes an agent by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the agent to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP no content status.

      Returns:

      Finds agents by name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to search for.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the list of agents matching the name.

      Adds a property to an agent's managed properties.
      Parameters:
      agentId - The ID of the agent.
      propertyId - The ID of the property to add.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the updated agent DTO.

      agentId - The ID of the agent.
